display_name: Overall RDI at 0% desaturation or arousal
description: RDI with arousals at all desaturations  [(total number of apneas and hypopneas with arousal) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hremba +hroa + hnrba + hnroa +carba + caroa + canba + canoa + oarba + oaroa + oanba + oanoa + marbpa + maropa + manrbpa + manropa) / slpprdp
